title: Black screen Issue
body: I used to have bug report issue after champ select, I was able to reconnect and play. After I tried full repair on my mac, The game won't load after champ select and turns to black screen. Even my mouse won't move in black screen. I need help to play league.

replies.body: This indeed does sound like a Connection issue! When the client can't connect with the server and get the information it needs the blackscreen of death can appear! A quick fix for this issue is running through our [Connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664). Now it's important to go through each step, but if it continues after that make sure you reach back out to me.

Hello

This sounds like a connection issue, even if your internet seems fine, there might have been some corruption or bad connection moment, please do everything in this troubleshooting guide to avoid any future problems: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues
